fields.description: An article in a conference proceedings.
fields.name: Conference paper

fields.description: An article from a journal or magazine.
fields.name: Journal article

fields.description: A document having an author and a title, but not formally published.
fields.name: Unpublished

fields.description: A report published by a school or other institution, usually numbered within a series.
fields.name: Technical report

fields.description: A book with an explicit publisher.
fields.name: Book

fields.description: A part of a book, usually untitled. May be a chapter (or section or whatever), and/or a range of pages.
fields.name: Book section

fields.description: A work that is printed and bound, but without a named publisher or sponsoring institution.
fields.name: Booklet

fields.description: A part of a book having its own title.
fields.name: In collection

fields.description: For use when nothing else fits.
fields.name: Misc
